annotation.spannedText: "Another 'mysterious' flu death. Well... mysterious to conventional doctors and media that is. Then she dies. All totally avoidable; flu shots don't work, well established in conventional medical literature, ibuprofen paralyzes the immune system and stops the life saving fever, and then going to the hospital that only knows its antibiotics and IV and nothing about sodium ascorbate. As Dr Fred Klenner said "Some physicians would stand by and see their patient die rather than use ascorbic acid because in their finite minds it exists only as a vitamin." Here is proof that his words are so true."

annotation.spannedText: "The 2015 CDC Childhood Vaccination Schedule includes 54 vaccines by age 6 years. If mothers get the flu shot and TDaP in pregnancy, that's 58 vaccines. When you take your infant to his or her "well baby check-up" at 2 months, 4 months, 6 months, and 12-15 months, your infant will receive 8-10 vaccinations each time. Infants vaccinated according to "the schedule" can receive 13 vaccines all at once at six-months. This is a complex medical procedure which has never been tested for either safety or efficacy. Never tested. Not once. There are ZERO studies of the [synergistic toxicity of the concurrent shots in the] childhood vaccine schedule as it is administered. "Those vaccines not only contain viral and bacterial antigens, they also contain aluminum, mercury, formaldehyde, polysorbate 80, detergent, MSG, antibiotics, food proteins including milk, eggs, and yeast, DNA from cows, dogs, chickens, rabbits, mice, and insects, and DNA from aborted human fetuses. The combined effect of injecting all of these substances at once has not been studied. It's all one great big experiment. This is the study and your child is the subject."

classMention.mentionClass: "The 2015 CDC Childhood Vaccination Schedule includes 54 vaccines by age 6 years. If mothers get the flu shot and TDaP in pregnancy, that's 58 vaccines. Infants vaccinated according to "the schedule" can receive 13 vaccines all at once at six-months. This is a complex medical procedure which has never been tested for either safety or efficacy. annotation.spannedText: "The pediatrician serves as the recruiter for the medical profession. He/she indoctrinates your child from birth into a life-long dependancy on medical intervention. The first stage of indoctrination is the "well-baby" visit. The well-baby visit is a cherished ritual of the pediatrician that enhances their income and does nothing constructive for your child. It's a worthless visit. Most doctors ignore the fact that the human body is a wonderous machine with an astonishing capacity to heal and repair itself. The best way to raise a healthy child is to keep them away from doctors unless it is a medical emergency. The greatest threat of childhood diseases lies in the dangerous and ineffectual efforts made to prevent them through mass immunisation. There is no convincing scientific evidence that mass inoculations can be credited with eliminating any childhood disease."

annotation.spannedText: "Official documents obtained from the U.K. Department of Health (DH) and the JCVI reveal that the British health authorities have been engaging in such practice for the last 30 years, apparently for the sole purpose of protecting the national vaccination program. Not only did the JCVI routinely ignore questions of safety as they came up with regards to the ever-expanding vaccination schedule, but the group actively censored unfavorable data that shed a "negative" light on vaccines in order to maintain the illusion that vaccines are safe and effective. Beyond this, the JCVI regularly lied to both the public and government authorities about vaccine safety in order to ensure that people continued to vaccinate their kids."

annotation.spannedText: "Ingestion of as little as 30 mL (1 oz.) of a solution containing 37% formaldehyde has been reported to cause death in an adult. Ingestion may cause corrosive injury to the gastrointestinal mucosa, with nausea, vomiting, pain, bleeding, and perforation. Corrosive injuries are usually most pronounced in the pharyngeal mucosa, epiglottis and esophagus. Systemic effects include metabolic acidosis, CNS depression and coma, respiratory distress, and renal failure."

classMention.mentionClass: "Ingestion of as little as 30 mL (1 oz.) of a solution containing 37% formaldehyde has been reported to cause death in an adult. Ingestion may cause corrosive injury to the gastrointestinal mucosa, with nausea, vomiting, pain, bleeding, and perforation. Systemic effects include metabolic acidosis, CNS depression and coma, respiratory distress, and renal failure."

annotation.spannedText: "Vaccine induced nosebleeds: Does your child get nosebleeds? It could be a condition called immune thrombocytopenic purpura or ITP. Guess what caused 80% of hospital ITP admissions in one study? The deadly MMR vaccine in two year olds and under. Also found to cause ITP is the hepatitis A jab along with the chickenpox and TDaP shots. If your child gets a shot and then starts having chronic nosebleeds a few days or weeks or even months later, they might also be bleeding in the brain or other places you don't know about. Is the vaccine worth it? Not in my world."

We were told he needs a flu vaccine every fall but I'm scared it will bring back the ITP."

annotation.spannedText: "My son developed ITP within three weeks of his MMR. It was a nightmare! My son's ITP was severe with platelets at about 4K, instead of 200K. Lots of bruising, bleeding, petechiae, and other issues. Then he had to do the Anti-D which made him anemic and sick--vomiting, etc. In addition to costing about $20K. Blood draws every other day for a couple of months. It was not fun. I hear the prednisone is worse."

annotation.spannedText: Publications by the World Health Organization show that diphtheria is steadily declining in most European countries, including those in which there has been no immunization. The decline began long before vaccination was developed. There is certainly no guarantee that vaccination will protect a child against the disease; in fact, over 30,000 cases of diphtheria have been recorded in the United Kingdom in fully immunized children.

classMention.mentionClass: "About 1 in 6 children in the U.S. had a developmental disability in 2006-2008, ranging from mild disabilities such as speech and language impairments to serious developmental disabilities, such as intellectual disabilities, cerebral palsy, and autism."

annotation.spannedText: "Vaccination, particularly for pertussis, has been implicated as a direct cause of an encephalopathy with refractory seizures and intellectual impairment. METHODS: We retrospectively studied 14 patients with alleged vaccine encephalopathy in whom the first seizure occurred within 72 hours of vaccination... INTERPRETATION: Cases of alleged vaccine encephalopathy could in fact be a genetically determined epileptic encephalopathy that arose de novo. These findings have important clinical implications for diagnosis and management of encephalopathy and, if confirmed in other cohorts, major societal implications for the general acceptance of vaccination."

classMention.mentionClass: "Vaccination, particularly for pertussis, has been implicated as a direct cause of an encephalopathy with refractory seizures and intellectual impairment. These findings have important clinical implications for diagnosis and management of encephalopathy and, if confirmed in other cohorts, major societal implications for the general acceptance of vaccination."

annotation.spannedText: "My son had all the vaccines and almost died from whooping cough at 1 year old."

annotation.spannedText: "Our research has focused on the effect of vaccines on insulin dependent diabetes, an autoimmune disease."

annotation.spannedText: that the incidence of diabetes rose 60% in New Zealand following a massive hepatitis B immunization program

annotation.spannedText: "We found that the incidence of diabetes rose 60% in New Zealand following a massive hepatitis B immunization program. The CDC initiated a study to verify our findings. Their preliminary data has been published and shows hepatitis B immunization when given starting after 8 weeks of age is associated with a 90% increase in the risk of diabetes, supporting our findings."

classMention.mentionClass: "We found that the incidence of diabetes rose 60% in New Zealand following a massive hepatitis B immunization program. The CDC initiated a study to verify our findings. Their preliminary data has been published and shows hepatitis B immunization when given starting after 8 weeks of age is associated with a 90% increase in the risk of diabetes, supporting our findings."

annotation.spannedText: "All told we estimate that there are over 10,000 cases of vaccine induced diabetes in the US each year. On average each case may cost $1 million in lost productivity and medical expenses. The estimated liability cost of the vaccine induced diabetes is over $10 billion per year. The current cumulative liabilities to the US government and to manufacturers could exceed $250 billion.

annotation.spannedText: "Concerns about a vaccine-autism link began in 1998 when British researcher Dr Andrew Wakefield did a small study indicating a possible link. But that study has since been retracted and researchers have not been able to duplicate his findings."
